title: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!: Motenaishi, Nazomeite Miru
original_name: 私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い! 未放送第 13 話
opening_song: "Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaete mo Omaera ga Warui (私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い)" by Konomi Suzuki n' Kiba of Akiba
ending_song: "Dou Kangaete mo Watashi wa Warukunai (どう考えても私は悪くない)" by Tomoko Kuroki (Izumi Kitta)
sinopse: The 13th episode of the TV anime bundled with the special limited first edition of the 7th manga volume.
